segments.text: This kitchen looks like a typical family spot, but something's off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate so carefully, her back to the rest of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's gushing from the tap, filling the sink way past the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling everywhere now, soaking the cabinets and making a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if someone slips on that wet floor? It could be dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good over by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that unstable stool, stretching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll come tumbling down with all those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is just standing there, hand out, like she's part of the sneaky plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's oblivious, humming away or something while drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden seems so peaceful, birds probably chirping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon before anything bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
